CHAT.comment: MOT dominates this activity , and EXP plays a significant part in trying to get Chi to play as well. Mot and Chi seem reserved in their play with the magnets. Many pieces are kept in the box until EXP tells them that they can take them out. There isn't a lot of experimentation. Mot notices that the turtle isn't magnetic , which is about the extent of magnetic exploration. The time is spent stacking objects. Video tape does not start until later; transcription until then is solely from audio
Time is 11:06. MOT and EXP discuss where EXP can plug in the video camera

u.a: video starts here

Chi sits on couch and Mot sits on a chair in the living room; a coffee table , on top of which are the black base and other various pieces , is in front of both of them; Mot holds box of magnets in her hand and is picking out pieces one by one while Chi watches
places a silver man on top of the black base , and continues picking out other silver men to line them up
a silver man fell; Mot sets it back up
sets down box of magnets and briefly holds onto the black base
picks up yellow wand and it sticks to the black base
MOT is surprised; she didn't expect the yellow wand to stick so suddenly and strongly to the black base
picks up yellow wand to look at it more closely
places the silver man which was on the yellow wand onto the black base in an upside-down position
picks up the yellow ball
puts the yellow ball onto the yellow wand; they stick together
shakes the yellow wand with the ball stuck on it
MOT is playing with the objects , Chi watches
picks up the wand , which has two balls stuck to it , and holds it over the men which are standing on the black base

Chi holds the wand over the men so that the side closest to the men is the one with the balls on it; EXP wants Chi to hold the wand so that the side without any balls or other objects is nearer to the men
turns the wand over so that the empty side of the wand is closer to the silver men; a silver man falls over

g.ga: empty side of the wand faces the silver men

u.a: puts the fallen silver man in an upright position and then holds the wand over the men again; the silver man falls again

g.ga: objects which are still in the box

u.a: touches the yellow triangle to the yellow wand
tries to lift a silver man up from the black base with a silver stick
Chi
hands the silver stick to Chi

g.ga: picking up silver man with silver stick

u.a: laughing
the yellow wand , which Chi set on the table , is attracted to the black base and moves quickly toward it
Wardell
tries to get a silver man from the black base to attach to the silver stick; it won't attach

g.ga: flat triangle , square , and circle magnets

u.a: lays the magnets on the coffee table
brother
<$=2> whispers angrily to Wardell
arranges balls and silver men on the black base; a silver man falls and a ball moves and both are drawn to the yellow wand which lies next to the black base
stands up silver man on the black base
the yellow ball rolled up the black base when Chi moved the yellow wand
touches the turtle to the yellow wand and the black base
for 20 seconds , Chi plays with the red and yellow balls , and the yellow wand; sets down the yellow wand to pick up the balls and the wand is drawn to the black base

for 30 seconds , Chi uprights a silver man on the black base , places the red ball on top of one of the silver men , and tries to put the yellow ball on top of a second silver man but the ball will not stay
the yellow ball stays on the silver man's head for a short while , then the silver man falls over
touches first silver man , who has the red ball on his head
moves the black base , and the red ball falls off the silver man's head
pulls black base with silver men on top toward her

g.ga: on top of first silver man

u.a: stacks two silver men
MOT has made a pyramid of four silver men
puts fifth silver man on top of the pyramid; everything stays in place
